article: the standard and poor 's agency has lowered its rating of kuwait 's biggest private holding firm kuwait projects co. -lrb- kipco -rrb- , citing a deterioration in its investments , a statement said thursday .
abstract: s and p downgrades rating of kuwait 's kipco
